name: nextcloud-deck
description: Nextcloud Deck is a kanban-style project management app built into the Nextcloud ecosystem. It supports boards, cards, due dates, and team workflows, ideal for task planning in self-hosted setups.
features: Kanban boards: Visualize workflows with customizable columns for task stages and progress tracking.
Card management: Create detailed task cards with descriptions, checklists, and attachments.
Due dates: Set deadlines and receive reminders for upcoming or overdue tasks.
Team collaboration: Assign cards to users, mention team members, and track responsibility.
Labels and tags: Categorize cards with color-coded labels for quick visual organization.
File attachments: Link Nextcloud files or upload documents directly to task cards.
Activity timeline: View card history including changes, comments, and user actions.
Board sharing: Collaborate with team members by sharing boards with specific permissions.
Filtering and search: Find cards quickly by assignee, label, due date, or text search.
Mobile access: Manage boards and cards from Nextcloud mobile apps on iOS and Android.
Calendar integration: View card due dates in Nextcloud Calendar for unified scheduling.
Nextcloud integration: Seamlessly works within the Nextcloud ecosystem with unified authentication.
